info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 32903
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.peren.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 32903
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.peren.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
peren.gouv.fr.	60	IN	SOA	dns112.ovh.net. tech.ovh.net. 2023070300 86400 3600 3600000 60

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 10826
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.peren.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 10826
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.peren.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.peren.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	1 mx4.mail.ovh.net.
www.peren.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	10 mx3.mail.ovh.net.

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 61834
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.peren.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 61834
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.peren.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.peren.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	TXT	"3|welcome"

info.name: DOM EventListener - Cross-Site Scripting
author: yavolo
dwisiswant0
info.description: EventListener contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability via the document object model (DOM). An attacker can execute arbitrary script which can then allow theft of cookie-based authentication credentials and launch of  other attacks.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.peren.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.peren.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: Missing Subresource Integrity
author: lucky0x0d
pulsesecurity.co.nz
info.description: Checks if script tags within the HTML response have Subresource Integrity implemented via the integrity attribute

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.peren.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.peren.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Not Allowed Connection: close Content-Length: 150 Content-Type: text/html Date: Fri, 05 Jan 2024 07:13:16 GMT Referrer-Policy: no-referrer Server: nginx Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15768000; includeSubDomains; preload; X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block 405 Not Allowed

405 Not Allowed

nginx
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: www.peren.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://www.peren.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
